Title: Requires reduction of a parent's child support obligation by the amount of social security dependent benefits received by the child
Summary: Requires reduction of a parent's child support obligation by the amount of social security dependent benefits received by the child.
LawCode: Amd ยง413, Fam Ct Act; amd ยง240, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the domestic relations law, in relation to reducing a parent's child support obligation by the amount of social security dependent benefits received by the child
